mdq:check.name: Metadata License Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a metadata license exists and is controlled by a vocabulary.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
# A metadata license is not present if 'metadataLicense' not in globals() or metadataLicense is None: output = "A metadata license was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(metadataLicense)): output = "The metadata license is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if metadata license is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(metadataLicense, unicode)): output = u"The metadata license '{}' was found".format(metadataLicense) elif (isinstance(metadataLicense, list)): output = u"The metadata license '{}' was found (first of {} licenses)".format(metadataLicense[0].strip(), len(metadataLicense)) else: output = u"The metadata license '{}' was found)".format(metadataLicense) status = "SUCCESS" return True
